explains: n. 仓库，库房；<美>公共汽车站，火车站，航空站；车库，修车厂
wordGroup: grain depot 粮食仓库，粮库
home depot 家得宝（美国家居连锁店）；机务本段，（机车）基本段
container depot 货柜箱装卸站
office depot 办公用品（公司总部设于美国）

sentences.en: The scene inside the Home Depot on Weyman Avenue here would give the old-time American craftsman pause.
sentences.cn: 威曼大道家得宝内的场景会让这位美国老派工匠驻足。

sentences.en: Sol Axelrod, 37, the manager of the Home Depot here, fittingly learned to fix his own car as a teenager, even changing the brakes.
sentences.cn: 37岁的索尔·阿克塞尔罗德是这里家得宝的经理，他十几岁时就学会了自己修车，甚至还学会了更换刹车。

sentences.en: Dave made a U-turn on North Main and drove back to Depot Street.
sentences.cn: 戴夫在北干道掉头，把车开回了第伯街。
